findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions includeAccount() and _getReflectionRate() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Wrong reflection from token calculations
findings.description: Missing parentheses when calculating target value.
